content.description: Start standing on a watermelon-sized cobble, move strait up through knobs and big crimps. Top out to the left.
content.protection: Pads, helmets for your spotters maybe.

content.description: Starts on the left side of Ruin Rock between the boulder and the wall, just below the big hueco/cauldron.  Climb up to the hueco on sketchy cobbles tend left after the hueco to the roundish plate and top out on the crumbles just left of the the thorny tree.  A fun little route with big consequences-- be careful.
content.location: On the left side of Ruin Rock a little South of Knobs You Can Trust.

content.description:
Routes are on the east face. Sunny in the morning, Shaded in the evening. 

  Rock is surprisingly good on the face, except for some stuff in the crack on the left side, but the top outs are very loose. 

  Although easy, the problems here should be done with caution.
